actions: Received in the Senate and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance. Ordered to be reported favorably.
Reported by Senator Baucus, Committee on Finance, without printed report.
Placed on Senate Executive Calendar. Calendar No. 26. Subject to nominee's commitment to respond to requests to appear and testify before any duly constituted committee of the Senate.
By unanimous consent agreement, debate and vote today.
Confirmed by the Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 71
name: Jacob J. Lew
nominee: Jacob J. Lew, of New York, to be Secretary of the Treasury
